name: Bubble Boost
description:
[Click 'Run Game', then once it loads, click inside game view to focus and play]

Project Boost Redux: Last year I built "Drone Patrol" around the material for the Boost module. Then my computer fried. I still have the old project files, but I decided to tackle the project from scratch. Here, then, I present Bubble Boost, at the early prototype stage.  "Early Access" stage.
